liggerillo was a hin commoner from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Bliggerillo was a lightfoot halfling man with a light skin tone, curly head of light brown hair, and blue eyes.
In the , during the threat of the Cult of the Absolute, Bliggerillo could often be seen arguing with human friend, Porter Juxon, over the Baldurs Mouth gazettes reliability and its claims that the walls of the Gate would protect its citizens. Bliggerillo showed no confidence in the broadsheets propaganda, unlike his friend. He believed that the gazettes monopoly on the news in the city had became a problem.
